'''Blanco Bracegirdle''' was a [[Hobbits|hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Blanco married [[Primrose Bracegirdle|Primrose Boffin]], and they had two children. [[Bruno Bracegirdle|Bruno]] was born in {{SR|1313}} and [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins|Lobelia]] in {{SR|1318}}.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref><ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
